name: Jungle Healing
effect:
Creates Grassy Terrain for 3 Rounds and cures any status conditions on itself. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's Terrain Duration to 4 Rounds.
 At Gold Rank, you can also cure any status conditions on an ally.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's Terrain Duration to 5 Rounds.
 At Diamond Rank, you can also cure any status conditions on a second ally.
